title: 14 Day Suspension/Rewards
body:
So I recently got suspended for saying some things I shouldn't of said and my suspension ends next Sunday, but I was just wondering how long does it take to get out of the 'penalty box' and get my honor level back, also will I miss out on the Worlds 2018 Season rewards? Or will I just not receive leveling rewards? (Champion Capsules, Chests etc.) 

Anything you can tell me about the two-week ban will help :))

Cheers!

replies.body:
If you've been banned, you don't get end of season rewards for that year (whether or not that has changed with the new honor system, i have no idea) and based on my ban from last year, when the pre-season/new season rolls through, your honor (if below 2) doesn't get reset, took me nearly a year to get back to honor 2 (banned September last year - returned to honor 2 August this year) 

The ban doesn't stop you from getting crates or capsules (leveling) you just don't get key frags for the duration (except when you honor up above honor 1) 

The easiest thing to do, is just not get banned at all, or be passive aggressive, the system is so dumb it can't detect anything other than the trigger words, so abuse it at your own risk

Muting generally works, at least to stop people getting under your skin with their words anyways

As far as I know season rewards used to just be tied to a date (if you'd been suspended after that date 1-2 months prior to season end you wouldn't receive rewards), now it's just tied to honour 2 instead.

I believe below H2 will reset to the base level you are, so if you are H1 with 2 checkpoints you will reset to H1 no checkpoints, but I'm not totally sure, the page from last reset only gave specifics for H2 and up and the FAQ is unhelpful there. It's possible you just don't move at all.

[Locked honour will prevent you from earning chests as well, but you will start earning them again once your honour unlocks. You start earning keys again from H1, but the drop rate is drastically reduced from 2 and up.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ)
Rip I was trying to search up how to get my honor level back and it said it resets on the next season. Guess not?
You won't be reset to level 2 no.

I feel your pain mate, there are so many snowflakes out there that are smiling now because of people getting banned for losing their temper, we all human and we all occasionally lose our tempers, except for the snowflakes that report us :((.

One of the group members (the snow flake) as I called it, wanted to go mid and wanted to swap with me and I said no to it.  To answer your question, the person is still a human, by crying about me not taking a champ he/she wanted me to take, I call him/her a snowflake and if you not sure what that means, pleas feel free to comment on this again and I'll try and explain it to you a bit better. Yeah I'm unbanned now though, gotta be big reformed :)

You need to get back to Honor 2.

When you come back you will be "Honor Locked" which is basically Honor 0, Level -1.

Takes about 30 games per level to unlock honor, if you get honor every few games and 0 reports since getting reported negates your honor for that game apparently.

I've played about 170 games since my ban but have been stuck on Honor 0, Level 3 for a while.

So, the lock on your Honour progress will come off sometime after your suspension ends, generally after demonstrating signs of reform (such as maintaining a positive/neutral attitude/behaviour in-game [basically, don't do what you did to get the ban]). After that, it will take some time to earn your way back to Honour 2, which is what you'll need to unlock access to all the "standard" rewards again, which may take several months. So far as what you'll be eligible for during that time, it's my understanding that a locked or level 0/1 Honour will *not* restrict you from earning levelling rewards, though it will restrict you from earning ranked rewards, Honour rewards (capsules) and Hextech Keys (reduced at 1, none at 0/locked).

You can find information about how the Honour system works in the [Honour FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) on the Support site.
